layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x292
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x292
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x260
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x40
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 734x39
          text run at (0,0) width 734: "The test passes if, when moved inside the colored rectangle, the cursor looks like an animated butterfly AND is not a"
          text run at (0,20) width 145: "butterfly when outside."

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 564x19
          text run at (0,0) width 564: "If inside the rectangle the cursor does not change, or looks like a help cursor, the test fails."
